sentence: I'm calling on Brian Kemp to join me in calling for an immediate special session of the legislature to ban abortion in Georgia after Roe v. Wade is overturned.
author: Ashley Oliver
title: Perdue Urges Abortion Ban in Georgia, Calls on Kemp to Hold Special Session if Roe Is Overturned
